statements: DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE entry_id = 100 AND user_id = 500

DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM flagged_transactions WHERE customer_id = 500 AND flag_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity';
